game.name: PBA Pro Bowling 2026
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Rise from amateur to PBA legend in the most realistic bowling simulation ever made, featuring advanced physics, realistic oil pattern transition, licensed PBA pros, deep career progression, and multiple competitive game modes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rise from amateur to PBA legend in the most realistic bowling simulation ever made, featuring advanced physics, realistic oil pattern transition, licensed PBA pros, deep career progression, and multiple competitive game modes.

reviewHighlights.text: 진짜 너무너무 좋아하는 게임 PBA 강추강추
